entry.name: .get
entry.description: Get one or all elements in the instance

argument.name: index
argument.description: The index of the element to return. If `undefined`, an array containing all elements will be returned. If it's negative, the resulting index will the the size of the instance minus the absolute value of the provided index.

returns.return: The element positioned at the index
An array containing all elements if index not provided
`null` if no element exists at the index
